node.html: Developed crowd density-based decision-making algorithm for optimizing smart room devices, with a focus on minimizing power consumption. Utilized RSSI (Received Signal Strength Indicator) input from smart room setups to estimate crowd density, offering a cost-efficient alternative to video-based solutions.

frontmatter.title: Twitter Bot Detection with Textual and Numeric Feature Set
frontmatter.company: University of Petroleum and Energy Studies

node.html: The project aims to detect Twitter bots to prevent the spread of false information using machine learning algorithms. By analyzing both textual and numeric features, the system labels users as genuine or fake. The project compares various algorithms like KNN, SVM, and Adaboost to determine the most effective approach for bot detection.
